### [MathPhDinFrance](https://mathphdinfrance.fr/)

Applicants to the Math PhD in France program supported by the [Fondation des Sciences mathématiques de Paris](https://sciencesmaths-paris.fr/) may consider the topic [*Pólya urn models and neutral theory of biodiversity*](https://scj-robin.github.io/documents/Peyhardi-Robin-PhDtopic-FSMP.pdf), which I propose with Jean Peyhardi (Institut Montpellierain Alexander Grothendieck, Université de Montpellier)
